TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Ciusinlun, title = Ciusinlun, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ciusinlun} }

S.FORM: alang Ciusinlun ga niya mki sku Takaw Si atu Toweng Ku, kwara sali buwan nya ga 55 buwan, 137 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 97% kyan ku 133 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 3% kyan ku 4 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Bunun 96%, Cou 1%, Paywan 1%. maki qu ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Ciusinlun hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay 'zil na Ciusinlun hya' ga llyung. tay mkyahu' na Ciusinlun hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkraya' na Ciusinlun hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkraya' na Ciusinlun hya' ga Dai-ni. rekisi kayal kyokay ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Ciosinlon ga niya mki sko Takaw Si ato Toweng Ko, kwara sali bowan nya ga 55 bowan, 137 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 97% kyan ko 133 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 3% kyan ko 4 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Bonon 96%, Coo 1%, Paywan 1%. maki qo ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Ciosinlon hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay 'zil na Ciosinlon hya' ga llyong. tay mkyaho' na Ciosinlon hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay mkraya' na Ciosinlon hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay mkraya' na Ciosinlon hya' ga Dai-ni. rekisi kayal kyokay ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy. pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
